item.title: CVE-2023-25790|2024-08-02T11:32:12.665Z -- xtemos -- woodmart
item.description: Improper Authentication, Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in xtemos WoodMart allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects WoodMart: from n/a through 7.0.4.
